input.sentences: finding a parking place so we could watch the parade was not an easy task .
this guy did all sorts of tricks on his bicycle .
true good luck coming our way ... loved the dragon .
fun time watching the dancers and listening to the music .
my friends are having a wonderful time interacting with the parade participants .
output.sentences: A festival is being put on in the city and traffic guards have been sent out to help people navigate the crowds.
People do all different kinds of performances for the festival including bike tricks.
Puppet masters bring giant winged dragons to life.
Women dressed in beautiful colorful clothing pose to have their pictures taken.
